welcome.title: Hi, I'm Afonso Arruda Gesualdi
welcome.subtitle: A multidisciplinary professional who connects design, technology, and strategy to transform ideas into meaningful digital experiences.
welcome.span: By combining Branding, Design, and Development, I create complete solutions that strengthen brands, elevate products, and connect people through technology.

about.title: About me
about.subtitle: Brazilian living in Argentina for over 7 years. Graduated in Web Development and Design from Da Vinci and specialized in Branding Management at EBAC (Brazil).
about.paragraph1: Throughout my academic journey, I studied Industrial Engineering for two years at Universidad de Palermo (UP), where I discovered my passion for programming with Python. I am currently pursuing a degree in Information Systems Engineering at the National Technological University (UTN).
about.paragraph2: I have practical and applied experience in Digital Marketing, Digital Graphic Design, and Brand Communication. I am certified in React technologies, including Electron, Native, Express, and Next.js, and possess a strong foundation in PHP and Laravel, Vue.js, Node.js, C#, version control with GitLab, Python, Django, Flask, and more. I work with both relational and non-relational databases.

expertise.title: What do I deliver best?
highlights: Creation and management of visual identities and digital brands.
Strategic UX/UI design focused on user experience.
Web and mobile app development focused on performance and scalability.
Consulting in Branding, Digital Marketing, and brand positioning.
Integration of design, storytelling, and technology for measurable results.

skills.title: Skills
items: Balance between analytical and creative thinking.
Branding management and strategic brand positioning.
High technical proficiency and aesthetic sensitivity.
Ability to translate complex concepts into intuitive interfaces.
Design and management of visual identities and brand systems.
